title: Does anyone know of any good League Youtubers who play a lot of top lane?
body: Back when I use to play a lot of ADC I would watch Phylol's ADC gameplays on YouTube and I learned a lot about the role/champs/mechanics etc, now that I'm a top lane main I was wondering if anyone happened to know any League Youtuber that plays top lane?

replies.body: Dyrus doesn't really give informative guides you just watch him play whatever he plays top and also, goldbay XD

unfortunately there aren't any i know of. Since most ADCs play the same and a good ADC should be able to play any of the 15~ adcs with little extra practice and a slight change of playstyle. For top lane tho the champ pool is massive, also encompasses most junglers and most mid laners as well, making the role very flexable. This makes making many videos about roles with very specific mechanics like ADC, jug and support sooooo much easier than trying to making lots for mid and top.

Dyrus doesn't do guides.

Gbay is a 1trick.

The best thing is to find videos on your champs you want to play top from a variety of youtubers. I recommend looking up scrapcomputer's channel to see if he has done the champ you are looking for since his guides are very detailed.
Thank you this was the reply I was looking for!
I dunno, I hear UberDanger does some insightful stuff like once a year. He does have his Darius flowchart...

Gbay is a very good example, I am a top main too but I don't record much of my own games lately XD
I will in a few weeks, but Gbay99 is the best I can think of right now.
